title: 04/02/21 DPS Hour 2 Jeff Pearlman
itunes:title: 04/02/21 DPS Hour 2 Jeff Pearlman
description:
Jeff Pearlman talks to Dan about the upcoming movie Show Time. Jeff tells Dan how it all started with a writer coming by his house.
